text: Jefferson Mateus de Assis Estacio (born 21 October 1994), commonly known as Jefferson, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Gżira United . ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Volta Redonda Futebol Clube players Category:Grêmio Esportivo Osasco players Category:União Agrícola Barbarense Futebol Clube players Category:Coritiba Foot Ball Club players Category:Esporte Clube Novo Hamburgo players Category:Esporte Clube São José players Category:Sliema Wanderers F.C. players Category:Gżira United F.C. players Category:Fujairah FC players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Maltese Premier League players Category:UAE Pro League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Malta Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Malta Category:Expatriate footballers in the United Arab Emirates Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in the United Arab Emirates Category:Association football forwards
title: Jefferson Assis
